you didn't even manage to make that an a: really? because I just tried it out and it worked, want me to help you find out how to insert URLs into firefox? :P

valid HTTP URLs begin with a resource type of "http", so "http://host/etc". leaving out the "http://" is invalid, and won't appears as a URL in most IRC clients. please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform_Resource_Locator (which i've googled for you)
